# init(ciImage:)

**Initializer**

Returns a representation of an image initialized to the specified Core Image instance.

## Declaration

```swift
init(ciImage image: CIImage)
```

## Parameters

- **image**: The [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] instance.

## Return Value

An initialized [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCIImageRep] object, or `nil` if the object could not be initialized.
title: init(ciImage:)
